{"id":839071033,"question_id":1666,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1667871298,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/839071033/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"43.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        \n       \n        boolean redo = true;        \n        \n        \n        while(redo==true){\n            int len = s.length();\n            boolean hit = false;\n            \n            for(int i=0; i<len-1; i++){\n                if((s.charAt(i)-'a'== s.charAt(i+1)-'A')\n                || (s.charAt(i)-'A'== s.charAt(i+1)-'a')){\n\n\n                    if(i+2<len)\n                        s = s.substring(0, i) + s.substring(i+2, len);\n                    else{\n                        s = s.substring(0, i) ;\n                    }\n                    len-=2;\n                    hit=true;\n                }\n            }\n            \n            redo = hit;\n        }\n        \n        return s;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
